Document.Focus: Varicose and other vein problems - self-care

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Varicose and other vein problems - self-care
QAPair.Answer: Blood flows slowly from the veins in your legs back to your heart. Due to gravity, blood tends to pool in your legs, primarily when you stand. As a result, you may have: Varicose veins, Swelling in your legs, Skin changes or even a skin ulcer (sore) in your lower legs , These problems may get worse over time. Learn self-care that you can do at home to: Slow down the development of varicose veins, Decrease any discomfort, Prevent skin ulcers ,
